short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swif Browser Extension streamlines SaaS management, enhancing security and compliance without disrupting employee workflows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swif Browser Extension helps maintain security and compliance by providing IT admins with insights into the SaaS tools used across the organization, all while respecting employee privacy. It works quietly in the background, ensuring seamless workflows for employees and empowering IT teams to manage Shadow IT risks effectively.
